includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of their suspects. Hit crime drama starring Mandy Patinkin, Thomas Gibson, Lola Glaudini, Shemar Moore and Matthew Gray Gubler.
